main.name: Edwin Zhang
main.bio: My degree in computer engineering specializes in software development. Additionally I love 'next-gen' technology so I also plan on minoring in Artificial Intellegience and Machine Learning. I have experience working with C++, Python and Javascript which you can find out more in detail down below or download a condensed version in my resume!

education.degree: Candidate for Bachelors in Computer Engineering
education.description: Had a wonderful experience at this school so far! My learning has been diverse from learning about circuits to analog/digital electronics, computer hardware, and my favourite: software development. I've had the opportunity to work on many cool projects and design courses with my peers and even some professionals. Additionally, I'm looking forwards to my third year as I will be taking really interesting software and machine learning courses.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Major Tonic is a Toronto based clothing startup looking to enter the fashion industry. My role on the team is to develop their online platform in form of a website to advertise and sell their products to their customers. I used react to turn their design of a website into reality as well as using MongoDB Atlas and NodeJS to create a drop shipping system. I've implemented their payment system as well as their user management system.

work.title: Research and Design Engineer
work.description: StatsDrone offers a software to affiliate marketers that assists in amalgamating and analyzing their data. I worked with a team to help perform research on how to bring their new feature of creating a centralized databank to life. This feature will allow their users to make more informed decisions on future investments and partnerships. My team and I benchmarked existing or similar technologies on how to handle big data, researched scalable algorithms to validate data and methods of protecting user anonymity.

projects.title: Open Street Maps GIS
projects.category: A worldwide GIS developed from scratch using C++ and geographical data from Open Street Maps.

projects.title: Various Machine Learning Problems
projects.category: A bunch of small side projects/problems tackled with ML algorithms. Developed using Python, Seaborn & Sci-kit Learn

projects.title: My Personal Website
projects.category: This site is open source! Developed using ReactJS

projects.title: Auto Job Application Tracker
projects.category: A webscraping tool that will automatically create a excel spreadsheet of your job applications. Developed using Python and BS4

testimonials.text:
I've had the pleasure of working with Edwin through the Engineering Strategies & Practice (ESP) this year. Edwin was one of the leaders for a group that worked on a complex data survey to work with my data software tool for webmasters. The team in particular was given 4 to 5 projects that I gave and without hesitation they all chose the hardest project and the one I hoped they could make progress on.

Their research and reports are now being used by my programming team to implement a solution they came up with. The team impressed me with how fast they were able to learn about the affiliate marketing industry that I work in and it was important for them to understand it to be able to work on the project.

Edwin took a lot of initiative in the group as he wasn't shy to ask questions. He had just as much initiative and ideas when coming up with solutions on the spot within our team meetings

I am ecstatic I had this group of students to work with and Edwin in particular brought a lot of ideas and solutions that lead the group in the right direction. The team's work will accelerate this data survey project and Edwin did an amazing job!
